hadiths.text: It was narrated from 'Abdullah bin 'Utbah bin Mas'ud that a man came to the Prophet and said:"I have given a gift to my son, so bear witness." He said: "Do you have any other children?" He said: "Yes." He said: "Have you given them something like that which you have given him?" He said: "No." He said: "Shall I bear witness to unfairness?

chapter.ara-name: باب ذِكْرِ اخْتِلاَفِ أَلْفَاظِ النَّاقِلِينَ لِخَبَرِ النُّعْمَانِ بْنِ بَشِيرٍ فِي النُّحْلِ
chapter.eng-name: Different Versions Of The Report Of Nu'man Bin Bashir Concerning Presents
